item.title: CVS 在下调 2024 年展望几天后开始出售债券
item.description: 在 CVS Health Corp. 因季度报告不佳和下调 2024 年展望而创下 2009 年以来最大跌幅后不到一周，该公司就开始出售债券，加入了众多在财报季后冲击债市的公司行列。【原文：CVS Health Corp. is selling bonds less then a week after shares plunged the most since 2009 on a downbeat quarterly report and cut 2024 outlook, joining a bevy of firms hitting the debt market following earnings season.】

item.title: 美国公司有 17.6 亿美元的机会释放现金
item.description: 由于利率预计将在一段时间内居高不下，企业财务总监们有强烈的动机跳过债务市场，释放出更多的公司现金。事实证明，他们拥有大量现金。【原文：With rates expected to stay high for a while, corporate finance chiefs have a strong incentive to skip debt markets and free up more of their companies’ cash instead. And it turns out, they have plenty of it.】

item.title: 穆迪称私人信贷面临高利率带来的痛苦
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）周二发布的一份报告显示，随着利率的长期走高给借款人造成压力，并使贷款人蒙受损失，私人信贷市场将进入一个紧张时期。【原文：The private credit market is headed for a period of stress as higher-for-longer interest rates strain borrowers and saddle lenders with losses, according to a report Tuesday from Moody’s Ratings.】

item.title: 来自中国的可疑煎炸油损害美国生物燃料业务
item.description: 中国正在向美国大量供应生物燃料产业认为可能被污染的废食用油，这损害了美国农民的利益，也损害了乔-拜登总统推广气候友好型能源的努力。【原文：China is flooding the US with used cooking oil that the biofuel industry says may be tainted, hurting American farmers and President Joe Biden’s push to promote climate-friendly energy.】

Moller - Maersk A/S said a successful rival bidder fell short of tender requirements as it seeks to overturn the award of a concession to run and expand sub-Saharan Africa’s biggest container port to Filipino billionaire Enrique Razon’s harbor firm.】

item.title: 艾因霍恩说市场 "崩溃了"。数据显示

item.title: 阿联酋航空首席执行官称波音公司需要加快速度、信守承诺

item.title: 德国住宅房地产复苏仍遥遥无期

item.title: 特斯拉自动驾驶调查升级，美国监管机构要求提供数据

item.title: 美国再融资启动，全球债券反弹面临供应考验
item.description: 本周二，美国财政部将开始出售总额达 1,250 亿美元的债券，美国降息希望点燃的全球债券涨势将面临首次重大考验。【原文：The global bond rally ignited by hopes of lower interest rates in the US will face its first big test on Tuesday, with the Treasury starting sales that will total $125 billion this week.】
